rules.build:
cd "$BOLT_BUILD_DIR" make -j"$BOLT_PARALLEL_JOBS"
rm -rf examples/rlfe cp -a "$BOLT_SOURCE_DIR/examples/rlfe" "$BOLT_BUILD_DIR/examples/" ln -sf "$BOLT_SOURCE_DIR" "$BOLT_BUILD_DIR/examples/rlfe/readline" cd "$BOLT_BUILD_DIR/examples/rlfe" && ./configure --prefix=/usr make -C "$BOLT_BUILD_DIR/examples/rlfe" \ CFLAGS="$CFLAGS -D_GNU_SOURCE" CPPFLAGS="$CPPFLAGS" \ LDFLAGS="$LDFLAGS -g -L$BOLT_BUILD_DIR/shlib" \ LIBS="-lreadline -ltinfo -lutil" rlfe
